dOH pU$rvAqd^^rdhasya# guqdaM ma#ddhyaqtaH SrONi#M jaGanAqd^^rdhasyaq tatO# dEqvA aBa#vaqn parA&su#rAq yat tryaq~ggANA(gm)# samavaqdyatiq BrAtRu#vyABiBUtyaiq Bava#tyAqtmanAq parA$&syaq BrAtRu#vyO BavatyakShNaqyA&va# dyatiq tasmA#dakShNaqyA paqSavO&~ggA#niq pra ha#rantiq prati#ShThityai || 56 
(Eqtau pa#SUqnA(gm) - samE#dhasyaiqva - tasyA&vO$ - ttaqmasyAva# dyaqtI - tiq - pa~jca#catvAri(gm)Sacca) (A10)
